pages.title: Home Page
pages.content:
# Welcome to Skillify Credentials Hub

Skillify Credentials Hub is a platform for managing your professional skills and certifications. Track your progress, showcase your achievements, and share your profile with employers.

pages.title: About Us
pages.content:
# About Skillify

Skillify was founded in 2022 with a mission to help professionals track and verify their skills and certifications in one place. Our platform uses cutting-edge technology to ensure all credentials are securely stored and easily verifiable.

pages.title: Privacy Policy
pages.content:
# Privacy Policy

At Skillify, we take your privacy seriously. This policy describes what personal information we collect and how we use it...

pages.title: Terms of Service
pages.content:
# Terms of Service

By using the Skillify Credentials Hub, you agree to these terms of service...

pages.title: Contact Us
pages.content:
# Contact Us

Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you!

Email: support@skillify.com
Phone: (555) 123-4567

faqs.question: What is Skillify Credentials Hub?
faqs.answer: Skillify Credentials Hub is a platform that helps professionals manage, verify, and share their skills and certifications in one place.

faqs.question: How do I verify my certificates?
faqs.answer: You can verify certificates by uploading them to our platform. Our AI-powered verification system will check their authenticity against issuer databases and other verification methods.

faqs.question: How can I share my skills profile?
faqs.answer: You can share your profile by generating a unique link from your profile page. This link can be shared with anyone, and they will be able to see your verified skills and certifications.

faqs.question: Is my data secure on Skillify?
faqs.answer: Yes, we take security very seriously. All data is encrypted both in transit and at rest. We use industry-standard security practices to protect your information.

faqs.question: Can I delete my account?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can delete your account at any time from the settings page. This will permanently remove all your data from our systems.

announcements.title: Platform Update 2.0
announcements.content: We're excited to announce the release of Skillify Credentials Hub 2.0! This major update includes a redesigned user interface, improved certificate verification, and new skill management features.

announcements.title: Maintenance Schedule
announcements.content: We will be performing scheduled maintenance on March 25th from 2:00 AM to 4:00 AM UTC. During this time, the platform may be unavailable for short periods.

announcements.title: New Verification Features
announcements.content: Coming soon: Enhanced certificate verification with direct integrations to major certification providers. Stay tuned for more information!
